titles.title: Safety for Americans from Nuclear Weapons Testing Act
To protect public health and safety, should the testing of nuclear weapons by the United States be resumed.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services, and in addition to the Committees on Energy and Commerce, and Natural Resources, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Energy and Commerce
